Headline: Loop 'L' Delays
ShortDescription: Brown, Green, Orange, Purple & Pink Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Clark/Lake. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown, Green, Orange, Purple & Pink Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Clark/Lake. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
